definition: Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan
see 芙蓉[fu2 rong2], lotus/food that has been minced, shredded, or ground into a paste, suitable for stuffing or making a sauce
short name for Chengdu 成都[Cheng2 du1]

sentences.english: Furong District is located in Changsha, the capital city of Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉區位於湖南省省會長沙市。
